Package com.mewna.catnip.entity.channel

Interface MessageChannel

  • All Superinterfaces:
    Channel, Entity, Snowflake
    All Known Subinterfaces:
    DMChannel, GroupDMChannel, NewsChannel, TextChannel, UserDMChannel
    All Known Implementing Classes:
    GroupDMChannelImpl, NewsChannelImpl, TextChannelImpl, UserDMChannelImpl
    public interface MessageChannel
extends Channel
    A channel that can have messages sent in it.
    Since:
    9/12/18
    Author:
    natanbc
